channel.title: The Legend of Hei on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in The Legend of Hei on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: GKIDS Acquires North American Distribution Rights to ‘The Legend of Hei 2’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: GKIDS has acquired the North American distribution rights to the Chinese box office hit, “The Legend of Hei 2.” The film is a follow-up to the 2019 feature “The Legend of Hei.”
